cause.description:
First fundraiser:
Friday June 8th, 2007 Darfur Dance-a-thon 5-11 pm
Pasadena Masonic Temple 200 S. Euclid Ave. Pasadena, CA
$15 at the door.
1. Stop human rights violations.
2. End genocide.
3. Spread information.
cause.mission: raise money and awareness about the genoicde in Darfur, Sudan.
cause.name: Dance for Darfur
